## Preliminaries

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(tidytext)
```


## Import data

```{r}
SOU_df <- read.csv("DFExport2.csv")
str(SOU_df)
```


## Subset data for testing

To give us a reasonably sized data frame, let's just take the first five rows:

```{r}
SOU_df_small <- SOU_df[1:5,]
str(SOU_df_small)
```


## Unnest tokens

```{r}
SOU_df2 <- SOU_df_small %>%
  mutate(tokens =  map(text, ~ unnest_tokens(.x, word, text)))
str(SOU_df2)
```
